page.title: 10MY HOUSE AND FAMILY IN HOOK
page.content: My house is 21 years old and sited on a corner in Bell Meadow Road-we moved in 4 years ago.The property is semi-detached,has 2 big bedrooms and a tiny box room which is now my sisters. My bedroom faces the back garden,is nice and light and painted yellow and white.The house was in a terribly neglected state and the garden was overgrown with knee high grass.We have rebuilt the kitchen and the garden is lovely now. My Mum works part time at Jill Homer's day nursery at the Old Schoool.My Dad works in Andover and is the accounts manager for a firm of school suppliers -he travels there daily by car.We have a dog and we walk him in a field near Hook School but not for much longer as I expect it will be built on just like the rest of Hook. Soon there will be no places left to play on near us.
